renderpass.code:
#define rot(a)    mat2(cos(a+vec4(0,11,33,0)))                // rotation                  
                       
void mainImage(out vec4 O, vec2 U)
{
    float t=9.,h,a,l,b,g,m=t; 
    vec3  R = iResolution,
          D = normalize(vec3(U+U, -3.5*R.y) - R),             // ray direction
          p = 7./R, q,d,                                      // marching point along ray 
          M = iMouse.z > 0. ? iMouse.xyz/R -.5: vec3(20,8,0)/1e2*cos(iTime+vec3(0,11,0)); // auto thumbnail
     
    for (O=vec4(1); O.x > 0. && t > .01; O-=.01)
        q = p,
        q.yz *= rot(.5-6.*M.y),                               // rotations
        q.xz *= rot(2.-6.*M.x), 
        t = min(t, h = length(q-vec3(0,1,0)) - .9),                        // head
        t = min(t, g = min( length(vec2(length(q.xz)-.85,q.y-.6)) - .03,   // top seal
                            length(vec2(length(q.xz)-1.,q.y+1.7)) - .03)), // bottom seal
        t = min(t, ( q.y < 0. ? max(abs(length(q.xz)-.95)-.05, -q.y-1.7) : length(q) - 1. )), // trunck
        t = min( t, l = length(q-vec3(.9,0,0))-.2 ),                       // lamp
        m = min(m,l),                                                      // for glow
        d=q, d.z=mod(d.z-.2,.4)-.2, 
        t = min( t, b= max( length(d-vec3(.95,-1.2,0))-.1 , abs(q.z)-.5)), // buttons
     // m = min(m,b),                                                      // for glow
        q.z = abs(q.z)-.8, q.zy *= rot(-.7), q.xz*=rot(-.5),
        t = min(t, max( length(q.yx) -.4 , abs(q.z)-.8 ) ),                // arms
        q.z-=.6, q.y+=1., a = atan(q.z,q.y),
        q.y = length(q.yz)-1.,
        t = min(t, max( length(vec2(length(q.xy)-.4+.1*a, mod(a,.2)-.1)) -.1   , abs(a-.3)-.5 ) ),
        p += .5*t*D;                                          // step forward = dist to obj          

    O *=   t==h ? vec4(.8,.9,1,1)   // head                   // color scheme
         : t==l ? vec4( 1,1,.8,1)   // lamp
         : t==b ? vec4( 0,.5,0,1)   // buttons
         : t==g ? vec4(.6)          // seals
         :        vec4( 1,.5,0,1);  // trunck and arms
    O += .5*exp2(-m) * vec4(.7,.9,1,1);                       // glow
}
renderpass.name: Image
